TextView.android:text: Child’s gender
bacha ka gender
Where was the baby delivered?
Bacha kahan paida howa
Did the water break before labor or during labor?
Pani k thali jis ma bacha hota ha wo kab phaiti bacha paida kartay waqt ya pehlay?
[Note: Labor begins when contractions are no more than 20 minutes apart.]
How much time before labor did the water break?
Kitni time pehlay thali phat gay th
What was the color of the liquor when the water broke?
Thali phatnay k baad jo pani nikla us ka rung kaisa tha
Was the liquor foul smelling?
Kya us pani ma koi budboo th
How much time did the labor and delivery take?
Bacha paida karnay k aamal kitni dair tak raha
[Record “00” if less than 1 hour] \n “00” likhain agar waqt 1 ghantay sa kaam h
Who assisted woman delivery at the facility?
Jis jaga bacha paida howa wahan kis na delivery karwai
Mode of delivery
Bacha kaisay paida karwaya

RadioButton.android:text: Simple Vaginal Delivery (seedha tareeqa bacha paida karnay ka)

TextView.android:text: During labor, but before delivery, did you receive any kind of injection to increase the intensity of pain?
Labor k doran ya bacha paida karnay sa pehlay kya kisi kisam ka teeka lagaya gaya maa ko dard barhanay ka liya
During labor, but before delivery, did you receive any kind of vaginal tablet to increase the intensity of pain?
Labor k doran ya bacha paida karnay sa pehlay kya kisi kisam k goli rakhi gay bachay dani ma dard barhanay ka liya
Was foley passed to induce labor
Foley catheter (nali) dali gay bacha paida karnay k liya
Which part of the baby came out first?
Bachay ka kon sa hissa pehlay bahir aya
How did the infant breathe right after birth?
Bachay na sans kaisay li paida honay k baad?
How long (in minutes) after birth did the baby begin breathing and/or crying?
Kitni dair baad bacha roya ya us na sans laina shuru kiya?
[Record “00” if less than 1 hour] \n “00” likhain agar waqt 1 ghantay sa kaam h
How long after birth did the birth attendant cut the cord?
Paida honay k kitni dair baad bachay k naaf kati gay
[Record “00” if less than 1 hour] \n “00” likhain agar waqt 1 ghantay sa kaam h
Which instrument was used to cut the cord?
Nali ko kis cheez sa kata gaya

RadioButton.android:text: New razor (Naya blade kit ma sa nikal k)
Bamboo stick or thorn (Chari ya kantay sa)
A thread or rope (Dhaga ya rasi sa)

TextView.android:text: Was the _____ (instrument) boiled before the cord was cut?
What was used to clamp the cord?
Nali ko kis chees sa bandha gaya

RadioButton.android:text: Thread, clean, new from the kit, boiled (naya aur saaf dhaga, kit ma sa nikal k)
Cord clamp (Nali bund karnay wali chutki)
A cloth or rope (kapra ya koi rassi)
The cord was not clamped at all (nali ko bhanda hi nahi gaya)

TextView.android:text: How long after birth was the baby given a bath for the first time?
Paida honay k kitni dair baad bachay ko pehli dafa nehlaya gaya
Was the baby given mother’s first thick yellowish milk (colostrum) immediately after birth?
Bachay ko ma ka pehlay ghara peela dhood pidaish k foran baad diya gaya
Reason for not giving mother’s first thick yellowish milk (colostrum)?
\n Kya waja th bachay ko maa ka pehlay ghara peela dhood nahi diya gaya
1. Mother had an operation
1. Maa ka operation howa
2. The baby is admitted in a hospital or a clinic
2. Bacha admit ho gaya hospital ma
3. Mother was not guided to give colostrum
3. Maa ko pata hi nahi tha is dhood k baray ma
4. The baby is sick or too weak
4. Bacha bhoot beemar ya kamzor tha
5. The elders forbade it
5. Bharoun na mana kar diya
6. The baby was given formula milk at the hospital or clinic which was continued
6. Bachay ko dabay ka dhood day diya gaya hosptial ma
7. Negligence on the part of mother
7. Maa ki laparwai
8. Mother is sick
8. Maa beemar th
9. Mother had some problem in her breast
9. Maa ko chaati ma koi masla tha
10. Because it is culturally considered as dangerous
10. Yeh dhood bachay k liya nuqsan day ha
11. It has been a tradition, not to breastfeed for a few days
11. Yeh riwayat ha k khuch din tak maa bachay ko dhood nahi pilay gee
12. No one at the hospital or clinic informed that it is necessary
12. Kisi na maa ko nahi bataya is dhood k faiday k baray ma
13. Other Specify
13. koi or reason tha
How soon after birth was the baby given mother’s first thick yellowish milk (colostrum)?
Paiday honay k kitni dair k andar andar maa na bachay ko apna ghara peela dhood diya
Have the mother started breastfeeding the newborn?
Kya maa na is waqt tak bachay ko apna dhood daina shuru kar diya ha
How soon after birth was the baby attached to mother’s breast for breastfeeding?
Pidaish k kitni dair baad maa na bachay ko dhood pilana shuru kiya
Was baby given anything else to drink since birth?
Bachay ko khuch aur diya gaya peenay ko pidaish k baad sa abb tak
What was given?
\n In ma sa kya diya gayaz
1. Cow, goat milk
1. Gai ya bakri ka dhood
2. Simple water
2. sada pani
3. Glucose or sugar water
3. cheeni wala pani
4. Gripe water
4. grip water
5. Fruit juice
5. phal ka raas
6. Formula milk
6. dabay ka dhood
7. Tea
7. Chai
8. Honey
8. Shahaid
9. Hookah water
9. hookay ka pani
10. Oil, Ghee
10. Tail ya ghee
11. Ghutti
11. Pidaish k waqt di janay wali ghutti
12. Rose water or similar
12. Arq e gulab ya koi aur milti jhulti cheez
13. Cerelac
13. Cerelac
14. Any herbal water
14. Koi aur gari boti ka pani
15. Other (Specify)
15. Koi aur waja
Why other things are given to baby or baby was not breastfed?
\n Bachay ko koi aur cheez kyoun di ja rahi ha
1. Mother had a CS
1. Maa ka operation howa
2. Breast milk is not available
2. Maa ka dhood moujoud nahi tha
3. Baby was ill or too weak
3. Bacha beemar tha ya bhoot kamzor tha
4. Baby was admitted to the hospital or clinic
4. Bacha beemari k waja sa hospital ma admit howa
5. Elders hold the breastfeeding
5. Baroun na bachay ko dhood pilanay sa mana kar diya
6. Top milk has started at hospital, which still continue
6. Dabay ka dhood hospital ma shuru karwa diya gaya aur abhi tak chal raha ha
7. Ignorance of mother
7. Maa k laparwai
8. Mother is ill
8. Maa beemar ha
9. Mother has some problem in her breast
9. Maa ko chati ma koi masla ha
10. Percieved that breastmilk of mother is dangerous for a baby
10. Yeh soch th k maa ka dhood bachay k liya khatarnak ha
11. Norms, not to breastfeed for a few days
11. Riwayat ha bachay ko khuch din tak maa dhood nahi pilati
12. Other, specify
12. Koi aur waja
